ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities have focused on various updates to the osu!taiko mode, including changes to the OsuModRelax hit leniency, the introduction of a consistentRatioPenalty to the Colour skill, and a comprehensive rework of the rhythm system. These updates aim to improve gameplay experience and provide more accurate difficulty calculations. The changes include new methods for evaluating consistency penalties, new data classes for rhythm patterns, and adjustments to how rhythm difficulty is calculated.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities have centered around expanding system mod articles, fixing compatibility issues with touch devices, and refining wiki content through various merges and updates. These efforts aim to enhance the overall documentation and user experience of the osu! wiki, providing more comprehensive and accurate information on system mods and other topics.
